channel.title: Scripting News
channel.description: It's even worse than it appears..

item.description: Welcome to December. Here's the OPML archive for November.

source:outline.text: Welcome to December. Here's the OPML archive for November.

item.description: I'm definitely starting to see breakage in Twitter. Things that used to work that now are obviously broken.

source:outline.text: I'm definitely starting to see breakage in Twitter. Things that used to work that now are obviously broken.

item.description: Perhaps we should try exterminating Nazis now that they're voluntarily decloaking. They owe us approximately 6 million lives.

source:outline.text: Perhaps we should try exterminating Nazis now that they're voluntarily decloaking. They owe us approximately 6 million lives.

item.description: My parents were children in Europe as the Holocaust was brewing. Their parents, my grandparents, got them out in time so that they could meet in Brooklyn, get married and have children, including me of course. My paternal grandfather told me, when I was a little kid, in his heavy Russian accent "Daveeed, when the Nazis come (he was sure they would) you get a gun and go on the roof and you shoot them!" My parents were horrified. I thought he was just a crazy old man. But he was a lot smarter and wiser than we gave him credit for.

source:outline.text: My parents were children in Europe as the Holocaust was brewing. Their parents, my grandparents, got them out in time so that they could meet in Brooklyn, get married and have children, including me of course. My paternal grandfather told me, when I was a little kid, in his heavy Russian accent "Daveeed, when the Nazis come (he was sure they would) you get a gun and go on the roof and you shoot them!" My parents were horrified. I thought he was just a crazy old man. But he was a lot smarter and wiser than we gave him credit for.

item.title: The scope of the Fediverse, 2022
item.description:
This picture is very informative.

I asked on my Mastodon account what apps other than Mastodon and micro.blog are on the ActivityPub network. I had heard of many of these, but in the newbie fog, I hadn't retained the memory.

I don't see any feed readers. (Also, Manton -- I don't see micro.blog.)

We need to fix that.

The Fediverse as of today.

source:outline.text: I asked on my Mastodon account what apps other than Mastodon and micro.blog are on the ActivityPub network. I had heard of many of these, but in the newbie fog, I hadn't retained the memory.
I don't see any feed readers. (Also, Manton -- I don't see micro.blog.)
